block.p: BASEBALL
MLB--Named Rafael O. Perez administrator of league's Dominican office.
American League MINNESOTA TWINS--Signed RHP Jason Simontacchi to a minor league contract.
Northern League SCHAUMBERG FLYERS--Re-signed Ron Kittle, manager, and Greg Hibbard, pitching coach, to one-year contracts.
BASEBALL
MLB--Named Rafael O. Perez administrator of league's Dominican office.
American League MINNESOTA TWINS--Signed RHP Jason Simontacchi to a minor league contract.
Northern League SCHAUMBERG FLYERS--Re-signed Ron Kittle, manager, and Greg Hibbard, pitching coach, to one-year contracts.
BASKETBALL

National Basketball Association BOSTON CELTICS--Signed F Jerome Moiso. CLEVELAND CAVALIERS--Agreed to terms with F Lari Ketner and then placed him on waivers. INDIANA PACERS--Announced the retirement of C Rik Smits. SACRAMENTO KINGS--Announced the contract extension of coach Rick Adelman through 2002.
International Basketball Association FARGO-MOORHEAD BEEZ--Signed G Peter Munro and F Daymond Forney. SOUTH DAKOTA GOLD--Signed F Derrick Price and G Rasheed Brokenborough.
FOOTBALL

National Football League GREEN BAY PACKERS--Signed DT Chuck Osborne. Waived OT Barry Stokes. Signed TE Adam Newman to the practice squad. Released G Tom Schau from the practice squad. JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS--Placed C John Wade on injured reserve. Waived DE David Richie. Signed G Aaron Koch and S Craig Miller. Waived OT Gannon Shepherd from the practice squad. Signed OT Reggie Nelson to the practice squad. KANSAS CITY CHIEFS--Placed DT Ty Parten on injured reserve. Signed DE Tyrone Williams to two-year contract. MINNESOTA VIKINGS--Signed Dennis Green, coach, to a three-year contract extension, through 2004. SAN FRANCISCO 49ERS--Signed LB Josh Gentry to the practice squad. Canadian Football League MONTREAL ALOUETTES--Traded OT Dwayne Morgan to Toronto for future considerations.
HOCKEY

National Hockey League NHL--Named Kenneth Martin, Jr., director, community and diversity programs. ATLANTA THRASHERS--Recalled Dan Snyder from Orlando of the IHL. CAROLINA HURRICANES--Assigned F Jaroslav Svoboda and F Ian MacNeil to Cincinnati of the IHL. DALLAS STARS--Assigned LW Ryan Christie, LW Jamie Wright, D John Erskine, D Mark Wotton and C Chris Wells to Utah of the IHL. NASHVILLE PREDATORS--Assigned D Alexandre Boikov, RW David Gosselin, LW Sean Haggerty and LW Ryan Tobler to Milwaukee of the IHL. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING--Reassigned RW Sheldon Keefe to Detroit of the IHL. Waived D Mel Angelstad.
East Coast Hockey League CHARLOTTE CHECKERS--Announced Hartford of the AHL has assigned RW Mike Hurley to the team. Re-signed D Kevin Pozzo. PENSACOLA ICE PILOTS--Named Eric Hoffberg assistant coach.
United Hockey League ADIRONDACK ICEHAWKS--Acquired G Sergei Zvyagin from Quad City for future considerations. MISSOURI RIVER OTTERS--Signed F Darin Kimble to a one-year contract.
West Coast Hockey League ANCHORAGE ACES--Waived D Dallas Ferguson.
COLLEGE

BROWN--Named Michael Fraioli and Jim Finlay men's assistant lacrosse coaches. CINCINNATI--Named Chris Moore women's assistant basketball coach and Christina Jansen women's basketball program coordinator. JAMES MADISON--Signed Sherman Dillard, men's basketball coach, to a contract extension through the 2004-05 season. FAIRLEIGH DICKINSON--Named Dana Lynn Jeannetti assistant softball coach. HOFSTRA--Named David Duke men's assistant basketball coach, Veta Williams men's basketball administrative assistant and Lawrence Thomas men's basketball strength and conditioning coach. MASSACHUSETTS-BOSTON--Named Joe Mallen men's ice hockey coach. PRINCETON UNIVERSITY--Named Rob Burke men's assistant basketball coach and Terri Dadio Campbell women's assistant basketball coach. RHODE ISLAND--Named Julia Chilicki women's crew coach. SACRED HEART--Named Andrew DeCicco men's assistant lacrosse coach and Jade Kersey men's assistant ice hockey coach.
